metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40032 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
libvips is a demand-driven, horizontally threaded image processing library.A specially crafted SVG input can cause libvips versions 8.14.3 or earlierto segfault when attempting to parse a malformed UTF-8 character. Usersshould upgrade to libvips version 8.14.4 (or later) when processinguntrusted input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-vips-8.0 - 8.12.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libvips-tools - 8.12.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libvips42 - 8.12.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: vips package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.12.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
